a with rightwards arrow on top space equals open square brackets table row 2 row 4 row 3 end table close square brackets comma space b with rightwards arrow on top space equals open square brackets table row 1 row 3 row cell negative 2 end cell end table close square brackets comma space d a n space c with rightwards arrow on top space equals open square brackets table row cell negative 5 end cell row 2 row 3 end table close square brackets. space J i k a space 2 a with rightwards arrow on top space plus space 3 b with rightwards arrow on top space minus space c with rightwards arrow on top comma space m a k a space space d with rightwards arrow on top equals...
